title: Ring Transfer
description: Move eight rings on a platform from right to left and back using both hands.

title: Marbles
description: Perform various exercises including moving balls, pronation, precision, and depth perception.

title: Flex Pad
description: Manipulate instruments with both hands, stretching elastic rubbers to feel tension and improve manual skills.

title: Shape Cutting
description: Precisely cut a different shapes using scissors without crossing the limitations.

title: Vessel Clipping
description: Safely clip vessels, such as the uterine artery in myomectomy.

title: Needle Loading
description: Develop precision in both hands and learn to maneuver the needle in space at different angles.

title: Basic Suturing
description: Grasp the needle correctly with the needle holder, rotate it through holes, and perform proper wrist movements.

title: Expert Suturing
description: Master suturing in different incision directions, mainly in a limited field of vision, and perform continuous suturing.

title: Suturing Pad
description: Perform extra and intra corporeal techniques and learn how to tie a knot under tension step by step.

title: Anastomosis: Advanced Suturing
description: Perform various types of anastomosis (end-to-end, side-to-side, end-to-side).
